column.name: author
column.remarks: last name of first author

column.name: year
column.remarks: year of publication

column.name: title
column.remarks: article title

column.name: journal
column.remarks: Journal name

column.name: pg
column.remarks: page range of article

column.name: url
column.remarks: link to article url

column.name: pdf
column.remarks: link to pdf version of article

column.name: doi
column.remarks: Digital Object Identifier

column.name: level
column.remarks: Value of covariate, units are determined in variables table by the variable_id foreign key.

column.name: name
column.remarks: Cultivar name given by breeder or reported in citation.

column.name: ecotype
column.remarks: Does not apply for all species, used in the case of switchgrass to differentiate lowland and upland genotypes.

column.name: date
column.remarks: Date on which management was conducted.

column.name: dateloc
column.remarks: Level of confidence in value given as date. See documentation for details.

column.name: mgmttype
column.remarks: Type of management

column.name: level
column.remarks: Amount applied, not always required.

column.name: units
column.remarks: units, standardized for each management type.

column.name: definition
column.remarks: Defines the creator and context under which the pft will be used.

column.name: name
column.remarks: unique identifier used by PEcAn.

column.name: phylogeny
column.remarks: Used to note the group of plants for which the prior was specified, often the group of plants represented by the data used to specify the prior.

column.name: distn
column.remarks: Name of the probability distribution, using R naming convention (e.g. 'beta','f', 'gamma', 'lnorm', 'norm', 'pois', 't', 'unif', 'weibull'.

column.name: parama
column.remarks: First parameter for distribution, as specified by R.

column.name: paramb
column.remarks: Second parameter for distribution, as specified by R.

column.name: paramc
column.remarks: A third parameter, if required.

column.name: n
column.remarks: number of observations used to specify prior.

column.name: city
column.remarks: Nearest city to site.

column.name: state
column.remarks: If in the United States, state in which study is conducted.

column.name: lat
column.remarks: Latitude, in decimal degrees

column.name: lon
column.remarks: Longitude, in decimal degrees.

column.name: mat
column.remarks: Mean Annual Temperature (C)

column.name: map
column.remarks: Mean Annual Precipitation (mm)

column.name: masl
column.remarks: Elevation (m above sea level)

column.name: soil
column.remarks: Soil type, as described in documentation.

column.name: greenhouse
column.remarks: Boolean: indicates if study was conducted in a field (0) or greenhouse, pot, or growth chamber (1)

column.name: site_id
column.remarks: Site at which measurement was taken.

column.name: specie_id
column.remarks: Species on which measurement was taken.

column.name: citation_id
column.remarks: Citation in which data was originally reported.

column.name: cultivar_id
column.remarks: Cultivar information, if any.

column.name: treatment_id
column.remarks: Experimental treatment identification. Required, can indicate observational study.

column.name: date
column.remarks: Date on which measurement was made.

column.name: dateloc
column.remarks: Level of confidence in date. See documentation.

column.name: time
column.remarks: Time at which measurement was taken. Sometimes necessary, e.g. for photosynthesis measurements.

column.name: timeloc
column.remarks: Level of confidence in time.

column.name: mean
column.remarks: Mean value of trait.

column.name: n
column.remarks: Number of experimental replicates used to estimate mean and statistical summary.

column.name: statname
column.remarks: Name of reported statistic.

column.name: stat
column.remarks: Value of reported statistic.

column.name: variable_id
column.remarks: Links to information in variables table that describes trait being measured.

column.name: user_id
column.remarks: ID of user who entered data.

column.name: checked
column.remarks: accepts values [-1, 0, 1]. 0 is default, and means that data have not been checked. 1 indicates that the data have been checked and are correct, -1 indicates that data have been checked and found to be incorrect or suspicious, e.g. outside of the acceptab

column.name: access_level
column.remarks: Level of access required to view data.

column.name: name
column.remarks: Name of treatment, should be easy to associate with treatment name in original study.

column.name: definition
column.remarks: Description of treatment, e.g. levels of fertilizer applied, etc. This information may be redundant with 'levels' information recorded in Managements table.

column.name: control
column.remarks: Boolean, indicates if treatment is a control or observational (1) or experimental treatment (0).

column.name: login
column.remarks: login id

column.name: name
column.remarks: User name

column.name: email
column.remarks: email address

column.name: access_level
column.remarks: data to which user has access

column.name: page_access_level
column.remarks: Determines the extent of data, if any, that user can edit.

column.name: description
column.remarks: Description or definition of variable.

column.name: units
column.remarks: units in which data must be entered.

column.name: name
column.remarks: variable name, this is the name used by PEcAn and in other modeling contexts.

column.name: citation_id
column.remarks: Citation in which data originally reported.

column.name: site_id
column.remarks: Site at which crop was harvested.

column.name: specie_id
column.remarks: Species for which yield was measured.

column.name: treatment_id
column.remarks: Experimental treatment identification. Required, can indicate observational study.

column.name: cultivar_id
column.remarks: Cultivar information, if any.

column.name: date
column.remarks: Date on which crop was harvested.

column.name: dateloc
column.remarks: Level of confidence in harvest date. See documentation.

column.name: statname
column.remarks: Name of reported statistic.

column.name: stat
column.remarks: Value of reported statistic.

column.name: mean
column.remarks: Mean yield reported.

column.name: n
column.remarks: Number of replicates used to estimate mean and statistical summary.

column.name: user_id
column.remarks: ID of user who entered data.

column.name: checked
column.remarks: accepts values [-1, 0, 1]. 0 is default, and means that data have not been checked. 1 indicates that the data have been checked and are correct, -1 indicates that data have been checked and found to be incorrect or suspicious, e.g. outside of the acceptab

column.name: access_level
column.remarks: Level of access required to view data.
